snippet.title: Ipswich man, 65 charged with attempting to pervert justice
snippet.content:
THE CORRUPTION watchdog has tonight charged an Ipswich man with attempting to pervert justice.
The 65-year-old Ipswich is expected to appear in Brisbane Magistrates Court on Tuesday.
He will face court on two charges of attempting to pervert justice.
This CCC served the Notice to Appear in court to the man's legal representative.
The CCC investigation is ongoing.
